summary: The National Nuclear Security Administration (NNSA) relies on a contractor to carry out complex and dangerous nuclear weapons work at the Los Alamos National Laboratory. Following substantial operational interruptions due to safety lapses, NNSA awarded a new contract in 2018 with the intent to improve safety at the laboratory. We found that the new contractor has taken positive steps toward improving safety, such as improving...
title: Los Alamos National Laboratory: Contractor Improving in Safety and Other Areas but Still Faces Challenges
